special_text:
You may activate the loyalty abilities of Alamazzar twice each turn rather than only once if you control an artifact, a creature, and an enchantment.
[+1]: Create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
[0]: Create a Weapon token. [i](It’s an Equipment artifact with equip {2} and “Equipped creature gets +1/+1.”)[/i]
[-4]: Create a white enchantment token named Glorious Anthem with “Creatures you control get +1/+1.”
